inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: consistent history and prior documented evidence of variable airflow obstruction

inclusion.criterion: signed written informed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: acute exacerbation of asthma by GINA guideline
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: respiratory diseases that can show similar symptoms to asthma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: neuromuscular diseases that may affect the seal off the mouthpiece during spirometry and FOT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled or active contagious respiratory infection diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: smoking history more than 10 pack years
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: significant comorbid illnesses that limit the life expectancy to less than 1 year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: mentally not fit or physically contraindicated for spirometry and FOT
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: psychiatric disease or cognitive impairment that may limit their ability of understanding or giving consent to the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
